page.title: 16Hollington Youth Centre
page.content: At Hollington Youth Centre in Wishing Tree Road North you can go to lots of different {sports clubs.}These include tennis, badminton, judo, archery, table-tennis, snooker and football. Some children go to the{'after school' club where activities such as craft and painting are offered. On Thursday evening there is a {disco}for young people. In the daytime there is a { {play school}for the under 5's. Some- times in the holidays they run a { {playscheme}which quite a lot of children go to. It is hoped that they can use Hollington Junior School field in the future. There is a{tuck shop}at the Youth Centre where you can buy sweets, drinks and snacks. Packet of crisps 12p. Can of coke 24p. Chocolate mars bar 18p.
